desc: My Paper Tote brings you stylish bags made from ethically sourced washable paper. Our bags are tear resistant, reusable, washable and beautifully crafted! Shop now!

layout.text:
At My Paper Tote we create gorgeous bags and accessories using washable paper!
Our sustainably sourced washable paper rivals leather in appearance and strength, giving you an ethically produced alternative. 
We pride ourselves on bringing you stylish and sustainable products made from our ethically sourced washable paper. 
Shop the paper revolution now!
